ComicInfo.Title: Time, Run Like a Freight Train...
ComicInfo.Summary: While spending a relaxing moment at the park, Spider-Man and Gargoyle encountered a group of goons hassling an old lady, who shall set forth the events that follow in this heart-throbbing issue. Featuring two unique journeys taken separately by our favorite web-slinger and the leathern-winged hero, this story tells of learning to let go of the past, and enjoying the greatness life shall bring to you in the future.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:42:20. [Issue ID 36522]
